summary:
Just a little experiment here.
This mod replaces the original werewolf transformation animation, making the transformation look a little more natural.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple mod that I put together with some vanilla animations extracted from the main game's files, as I lack the required software to make my own animations.
I made this mod because I think that the vanilla werewolf transformation doesn't look that convincing. I made this mod for myself in the first instance but I have been encouraged by friends to upload this mod to the nexus.
Another reason for me to upload this mod is to encourage people who have animation software to make more mods like this as I think the nexus is lacking in this department.

[size=4]Installation[/size]
Installation is quite simple but I strongly recommend to use a mod manager for this.

Extract contents of the zip folder and place the 'Data' folder into the \Skyrim folder.
That's installation done with.

[size=4]Uninstallation
[/size]Go to \Skyrim\Data\Meshes\Actors\character\animations. Delete these files: ww_camera.hkx, ww_stage1-9.hkx
That will uninstall the mod, again I recommend using a mod manager for this.


The second file I have added will add a howl to the end of the animation, install one or the other.
If you are swapping one for the other, please uninstall the mod and re-install the one you want.#

Also, this mod is completely compatible with everything ;)


Enjoy!
author: Roenaxx
